subject: Security Alert: New login to your HealthPlus Medical Connect account
body:
Security Alert from HealthPlus Medical Connect
            
            We detected a new login to your account from:
            
            Device: Mac
            Location: San Francisco, CA
            Time: 2025-04-16 14:40
            
            If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.
            Secure your account immediately: https://connect.healthplusmedical.com/security?token=19bda1df-4b0e-46cf-a6f4-add818caca02
            
            The HealthPlus Medical Connect Security Team

subject: URGENT: Security Alert for Your HealthPlus Medical Financial Account
body:
Dear Valued HealthPlus Medical Financial Customer,
            
            We have detected unusual activity on your HealthPlus Medical Financial account. For your security, we have temporarily limited access to sensitive account features.
            
            Please verify your identity by following this secure link:
            https://banking.healthplusmedical.com/verify?session=f0f0f5a8-c561-4ffb-8d8c-ca6b0d7f9896
            
            If you do not complete this verification within 24 hours, your account may be suspended.
            
            Regards,
            HealthPlus Medical Financial Security Team

subject: Your package #TRK33375 requires attention
body:
Delivery Notification
            
            Your package #TRK33375 is pending delivery.
            
            Due to address verification required, we need additional information to deliver your package.
            Please provide the required information by clicking here: https://delivery.healthplusmedical.com/track?id=d1f8921c-a7c8-4b6c-8425-2ce9ebe058ac
            
            Delivery Details:
            - Tracking Number: TRK33375
            - Expected Delivery: 2025-04-16
            - Address: 123 Main St...
            
            Thank you,
            HealthPlus Medical Shipping Delivery Team
